pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenCensus PostgreSQL Integration============================================================================|pypi|.. |pypi| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/opencensus-ext-postgresql.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/opencensus-ext-postgresql/The integration with PostgreSQL supports the `psycopg2`_ library and is specifiedto ``trace_integrations`` using ``'postgresql'``... _psycopg2: https://pypi.org/project/psycopg2Installation------------:: pip install opencensus-ext-postgresqlUsage-----.. code:: python from opencensus.trace import config_integration config_integration.trace_integrations(['postgresql'])References----------* `OpenCensus Project <https://opencensus.io/>`_
